dataList.name: White Breath - Safeguard the Mind
dataList.desc:
- Amount of SP healed due to the unit's 'Base factors increasing Sanity(SP)' increases by 5
- Amount of SP lost due to the unit's 'Base factors decreasing Sanity(SP)' decreases by 5
- Turn End: Lose 1 Stack

dataList.name: Red Breath - Strengthen the Body
dataList.desc:
- Gain +(SP/10) Offense Level and Defense Level (rounded down)
- Turn End: Lose 1 Stack

dataList.name: Red Breath - Protect
dataList.desc: - Turn Start: Gain 30 Shield for this turn

dataList.name: Purple Breath - Hysteria
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 4
- Turn End: Lose HP and SP equal to Stack
- Turn End: Moses loses HP and SP equal to Stack
- Gain 2 Fragile, 3 Bind, and 3 Plus Coin Drop next turn
- Lose 1 Stack when this effect is triggered

dataList.name: Deep Breath - Red
dataList.desc: - Max Stack: 3 - Turn End: At Max Stack, use a powerful Skill - Consumed when using a certain Skill - Becomes immune to Panic under this effect - Take +(Stack x 20)% damage and lose Defense Level equal to Stack - Turn End: Take 10 HP damage and 20 SP damage
dataList.flavor: Sink deeper and let the crimson images surface with every breath.

dataList.name: Red Breath - Push the Body's Limit
dataList.desc:
- Gain 5 Offense Level
- Base Skill Clash Power +5

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Moses
dataList.desc:
- Defense Level +3, Defense Power +2
- If this unit lost SP due to its Skill's SP loss effects, gain Protection equal to (SP lost / 5) next turn

dataList.name: Memories of that Day
dataList.desc:
- Base Attack Level -??
- Base Defense Level -??
- Turn Start: Gain 5 Haste

dataList.name: Body Broken Beyond Repair
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile and apply +2 Defense Power Up to Ezra and Vespa

dataList.name: Body Broken Beyond Repair
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 1 Fragile and use 'Steady the Breath'

dataList.name: Insecurity: Mask
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Lose 1 Attack Power
- Defense Level +2

dataList.name: Insecurity: Mask
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Lose 1 Attack Power
- Defense Level +3

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag - Allas Workshop
dataList.desc:
Draws the next Workshop weapon from the Dimensional Bag
- Current Workshop weapon: Allas Workshop Gloves
- Next Workshop weapon: Nester Workshop Hammer
dataList.flavor: "Everything from this Workshop kicks off the acceleration with a bang! It's super punchy and satisfying!"

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag - Nester Workshop
dataList.desc:
Draws the next Workshop weapon from the Dimensional Bag
- Current Workshop weapon: Nester Workshop Hammer
- Next Workshop weapon: Screw Atelier Drill Hammer
dataList.flavor: "Alright, so... Hit the button right as the strike lands, and bam! The vibration goes nuts and maximizes the area of the impact. It's a riot once you get the hang of it!"

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag - Screw Atelier
dataList.desc:
Draws the next Workshop weapon from the Dimensional Bag
- Current Workshop weapon: Screw Atelier Drill Hammer
- Next Workshop weapon: Namir Workshop Gauntlets
dataList.flavor: "Seriously, gotta be careful with this Workshop's babies. One bad slip and you'll end up zapping yourself instead!"

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag - Namir Workshop
dataList.desc:
Draws the next Workshop weapon from the Dimensional Bag
- Current Workshop weapon: Namir Workshop Gauntlets
- Next Workshop weapon: Allas Workshop Gloves
dataList.flavor: "Now this one's got G Corp.'s Singularity baked in—the Sphere! Here's how it works: You float up, pop the switch midair, and crush down with the weight of the gravity. Land a solid hit, and it's gonna be... brutal."

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag - YuRia Atelier
dataList.desc: - Current Workshop Weapon: YuRia Atelier Special Handmade Golden Retriever-Exclusive Axe
dataList.flavor:
"Oh, YuRia? Yeah, she's gone full solo now, and her Workshop—man, it's totally blowin' up."

"Speaking of, I still remember her turning back from plush doll to human... Haha, that case sure was one hell of a bombshell."

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Ezra
dataList.desc:
- Base Defense Level +2
- Base Attack Power +1, Defense Power +2
 For every 'Deep Breath - Red' Stack on Moses, Ezra and Vespa's Assist Defense heals 4 more SP for Ezra (max 12)

dataList.name: The Book of Vengeance
dataList.desc: When The Middle Nursefather - Matthias or The Middle Apprentice - Kira uses a Skill to hit a target who has this effect, they heal 7 SP (once per Skill)
dataList.flavor: "Bastards... Prepare to face complete and total extermination."

dataList.name: The Middle - Grudge
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Reduced when using certain Skills
- For every Stack, Offense Level +1, Defense Level -2, and Counter Skills deal +5% damage
- At max Stack, take +20% damage
dataList.flavor: The Middle never forgets.

dataList.name: The Middle - Grudge
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Reduced when using certain Skills
- For every Stack, Offense Level +1, Defense Level -2, and Counter Skills deal +5% damage
- At max Stack, take +20% damage

dataList.name: I Got Praised!
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Reduced by 1 when this unit is hit by 2 Skills
- Base Power +1 for every 2 Stack
- Slash and Blunt Skills deal +8% damage for every Stack

dataList.name: Check This Out, Kiddo!
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Reduced by 1 when this unit is hit by 2 Skills
- Base Power +1 for every 2 Stack
- Slash and Blunt Skills deal +5% damage for every Stack

dataList.name: The Middle - Vengeance Tattoo [<s>Great Brother</s>]
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 2
- Expires at Turn End
- Deal +10% Blunt and Envy damage
dataList.flavor: A Great Brother whose prestige was secured by his loyalty; a fool who has abandoned that very thing over a sword.

dataList.name: The Middle Styled Augmentation Tattoos
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Expires at Turn End
- Deal +10% Blunt and Envy damage

dataList.name: Thermal Blades ON
dataList.desc: On Hit with Thermal Blade Skill Coins: additionally inflict Burn Potency and Count equal to Bleed Potency and Count inflicted
dataList.flavor:
It's not as good as papa's, but I can also slice and sizzle at the same time!
But unlike papa's, I gotta let it cool from time to time...

dataList.name: Thermal Blades OFF
dataList.desc: Additional effects of Thermal Blade Skills do not activate
dataList.flavor: The sword's thermal wires are deactivated.

dataList.name: Ridiculous Grit
dataList.desc:
- Reduce all incoming damage to 1 (including Keyword damages)
- On Clash Win, heal (Clash count x 5) more SP (max 15)
- Turn End: If this unit lost SP this turn due to its Skill effects, gain 3 Damage Up next turn
dataList.flavor: "I don't need some stupid crutch like that "Shin (心)" crap. I just gotta pull as much power as I can from these tattoos and grit my teeth, and I'll overpower your fancy little tricks no problem."

dataList.name: Mad Rampage
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 4 Defense Level Down; gain 1 Damage Up for every 30 HP damage taken last turn (max 5)

dataList.name: Mad Rampage
dataList.desc:
- Panic
Turn Start: Gain 3 Attack Power Up and 5 Defense Level Down; gain 1 Damage Up for every 25 HP damage taken last turn (max 5)

dataList.name: Fervor
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
Turn Start: Gain 2 Defense Level Down; gain 1 Damage Up for every 30 HP damage taken last turn (max 5)

dataList.name: Fervor
dataList.desc:
- Panic
Turn Start: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 3 Defense Level Down; gain 1 Damage Up for every 25 HP damage taken last turn (max 5)

dataList.name: Corpus Ingredient (Bones)
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 206
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)

dataList.name: Corpus Ingredient (Blood)
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)

dataList.name: Corpus Theater
dataList.desc: - Enter an 'immobilized' state where this unit's buffs, HP, and SP cannot be changed. Forms a Corpus Theater connected to this unit

dataList.name: Artwork: Tibia
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Gain 4 Power Up and 2 Slash Power Up
- When inflicting Bleed with Attack Skills, inflict 2 more Bleed Potency

dataList.name: Viewing the Tableau
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level -20
- Base Defense Level -20
- The Sinners & Assist Units' Retreat-related abilities do not activate
- Turn Start: Gain 7 Protection if The Ring Apprentice has not retreated from this Encounter
dataList.flavor: "The appreciation of artwork in a gallery calls for unhurried contemplation. Please remember—impatience dulls the appreciation of art."

dataList.name: Ingredient-shedding Wound
dataList.desc: Gain 2 Offense Level Down when using a Skill (max 3 times per turn)

dataList.name: The Exhibition is Complete!
dataList.desc: Lose the Encounter when all Sinners and Assist Units fall under the effect of Corpus Theater
dataList.flavor: That precise, delicate spot where all elements of flesh and muscles are arranged to perfection.

dataList.name: K Corp. Emergency Ampule
dataList.desc:
If at least one ally other than this unit is alive, activate the following effects upon taking damage that would reduce this unit's HP to 0:
- If Staggered, recover from Stagger
- Fully heal HP
- All allies lose 1 K Corp. Emergency Ampule
- This effect activates before the "X does not reduce HP below 1" effects from Identities & E.G.O Passives

dataList.name: Lamp
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- Gain 1 Bind for every 2 Stack next turn (max 10)
- Turn End: Gain +(Stack / # of this unit's Slot) Aggro to each of this unit's Skill Slot next turn

dataList.name: Dazzle
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: If this unit is not Staggered, the Attack Skill equipped in this unit's last Skill Slot prioritizes Hohenheim and cannot be redirected
- This effect expires at the end of the turn it is activated

dataList.name: E.G.O Attunement Boost
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level +15
- Base Defense Level +15

dataList.name: E.G.O Attunement Overload
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level +15
- Base Defense Level +15
- Turn End: Increase Lamp Stack to 20; lose 2 HP and 1 SP for every Stack gained (this effect does not reduce this unit's HP below 1)
dataList.flavor: Overdrawing the power of the Extracted E.G.O.

dataList.name: Wave of Somnolence
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 1 fewer Lamp from Skills

dataList.name: Wave of Somnolence
dataList.desc:
- Panic

dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level +10
- Base Defense Level +10

dataList.name: E.G.O Attunement Overload
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level +10
- Base Defense Level +10
- Turn End: Gain 4 Burn and lose 5 SP
dataList.flavor: Overdrawing the power of the Extracted E.G.O.

dataList.name: Degraded Corrosion
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile

dataList.name: Degraded Corrosion

- Turn Start: Lose 5 HP and gain 1 Offense Level Up

dataList.name: Outmoded Art
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: Lose 5 HP and gain 1 Offense Level Up

dataList.name: Eye of Precognition
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 30
- Clash Power +2
- Turn Start: Gain 10 Stack
- Turn Start: Heal (Stack / 4) SP
dataList.flavor: "The eye does not possess some supernatural power that shows its user the destined future. It is more akin to a computing device that analyzes everything it sees and provides the most likely scenario in the upcoming instant."

dataList.name: Eye of Precognition - Overheat
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 30
- Attack Skills deal -20% damage
- Convert all Coins on Skills that spend Acceleration Round to Unbreakable Coins
- Turn Start: Gain 10 Stack
- At 30 Stack, convert into "Eye of Precognition"

dataList.name: Accelerating Future
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Clash Power +1 for every Stack
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 Stack
- Expires at Skill End
dataList.flavor: The Palermitan Style is known to accelerate the longer a duel lasts.

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Valencina
dataList.desc:
- Defense Level +3 for every instance of Clash Lose in the last turn (max 6)
- Deal +3% damage for every Poise Potency on self (max 15%)

dataList.name: Acceleration Round
dataList.desc:
- Max Capacity: 10
- Unique Ammo
- Spent by certain Skills

dataList.name: Game Target
dataList.desc: Fix this unit's Speed to 1; all Attack Skills of "The Thumb Nursefather - Valencina" targets this unit
dataList.flavor: Prey marked by Famiglia Bognatelli will be hunted down without fail.

dataList.name: Superthermogenesis
dataList.desc: Turn End: Take fixed damage equal to (Stack x 0.5)% of Max HP, then the effect expires

dataList.name: Shin (心) - The Red Gaze
dataList.desc: Deal +50% Wrath damage

dataList.name: Blinding Blood [盲血]
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 Bind next turn for every Stack
Turn End: Take (Bleed Potency x Stack) HP damage
Combat Start: Gain 3 Bleed for every Stack, then expire
dataList.flavor: "If blood can be contained within a gaze, it can also be accumulated and condensed for piercing. It can also, of course, be used to blind. Okay?"

dataList.name: Gebura's Blade
dataList.desc:
- Convert all Skill Coins into Unbreakable Coins
- Deal +100% damage
- Plus Coin Skills gain Coin Power +1; Minus Coin Skills gain Final Power +1
- For this turn, this unit cannot be Staggered from all sources of damage
- At less than 10 HP, heal to 10 HP
- For this turn, this unit's HP does not drop below 10
- For this turn, every Coin Hit from Base Attack Skills and Counter Skills heals 10% of the damage dealt (max healing from each Skill: 100)
- Expires at Turn End

dataList.name: Shattered World
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Expires at Turn End
- Take x1.2 damage from Burn (rounded down; except Unique Burn)
- Take +10% damage from Yi Sang's Wrath and Gloom Base Attack Skills

dataList.name: Entangled Life [羅生]
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 999
- Gain 1 Stack for every HP damage dealt by Ryōshū's Skills
- Deal +1% damage with Base Skills for every 33 Stack (max 10%)
dataList.flavor: 'Twisted and entangled beyond measure, bound and woven into a cocoon. Thread. Life. World.'

dataList.name: Hurting Pest [Roaches]
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 50
- Lose 1% max HP per Stack
- Combat Start: Take (Stack x 12) fixed damage
- Whenever this unit loses Stack of this effect, gain E.G.O resources of random Affinities equal to Stack lost (max 15)
dataList.flavor: "This creature is unmatched among those scorned as pests."

dataList.name: Protecting Pest [Roaches]
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 50
- Whenever this unit is inflicted with (Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, Sinking) Potency or Count, instead of gaining those effects, lose the same amount of Stack of this effect instead
- Expires at Turn End
dataList.flavor: "They are baleful and stubborn, not to mention tenacious."

dataList.name: Tiansha Star's Bladewound [天殺星傷]
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level -15
- Base Defense Level -15
dataList.summary: - Lose Base Offense and Base Defense Level
dataList.flavor:
A cut from the Tiansha Star's Blade - Arayashiki leaves a blade wound that seems to burn with implacable fire.
This burning mark can never fade, for the wielder has slashed through the existence of their opponent at the cost of their own.

dataList.name: Backward Flow - Bitterness
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- Deal and take +2% damage for every Stack
dataList.flavor: 'The memory of being forgotten and abandoned by you refuses to let go... like a stubborn knot of thread that clings.'

dataList.name: Forward Flow - Compassion
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- Deal and take -2% damage for every Stack
dataList.flavor: 'Perhaps it was the passage of time and the years weighing on me that led me to believe I could finally understand and embrace you.'

dataList.name: Paroxysm - Afterimage Entanglement
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- On Hit, activate the following effects based on Stack:
  · Deal Slash damage equal to (final damage of the Coin / 10) (activates (# of Stack) times)
  · 2+: Inflict 1 Burn
  · 3+: Inflict 1 Bleed
  · 4+: Inflict 1 Bind next turn
  · 5+: Inflict 1 Poison
dataList.summary: Apply additional effects to this unit's attacks based on Stack

dataList.name: Shin (心) - A Certain Sinclair
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +3
- Deal +20% damage with Unopposed Attack
- Gain 2 more Poise Potency and +1 more Poise Count from Skills
- At 20+ SP, +10% chance to flip Heads for Plus Coins
- Turn End: Gain 1 Haste next turn for every 10 SP (max 4)
- Turn End: Gain 1 Power Up next turn for every 20 SP (max 2)

dataList.name: Sign - Manifestation of the Future
dataList.desc:
- When Clashing against higher-level targets, Clash Power +2
- Turn End: If Staggered, recover from Stagger next turn
dataList.flavor: Abraxas

dataList.name: Umbra Unsealed
dataList.desc:
- Deal +10% damage with Base Attack Skills
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Plus Coin Boost

dataList.name: Of the Second Smoke War
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile
- SP Heal Efficiency +2

dataList.name: Of the Second Smoke War
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Fragile and 2 Clash Power Up

dataList.name: Sealed Sword
dataList.desc: Unlocks access to certain Skills based on the state of the sword.
dataList.flavor: A trio of tight-knit siblings together journeyed into the depths of the Ruins.

dataList.name: First Seal Removed
dataList.desc: Unlocks access to certain Skills based on the state of the sword.
dataList.flavor:
There, they came upon a sweltering cavern where a river of lava flowed, carrying buildings on its currents.
They traced the river to the source of its heat, and found a sword... that could hardly be called a sword. It was more like a hunk of white-hot metal.

dataList.name: Second Seal Removed
dataList.desc: Unlocks access to certain Skills based on the state of the sword.
dataList.flavor:
"As the eldest brother, I claim this sword as mine."
The eldest brother's declaration sparked the inappeasable flame of desire and envy in the youngest brother.

So, I killed my brother and sister both, and took the sword as my own. I left no evidence behind.
But the eyes still gazed upon me with doubt, and when they cast me into this hell, I fell without resistance.
Still, I did not lose my smile.
For the sword of legends was mine.

dataList.name: Lævateinn
dataList.desc:
Unlocks access to certain Skills based on the state of the sword.
Turn Start: Inflict 5 Burn and +2 Burn Count against all units
dataList.flavor:
Ironically, the blade was beyond Matthias's ability to properly wield.
Of course, he would not have been able to hold this sword at all had he not the aptitude for it. It was simply that fickle of a Relic.
The truth of the matter was, nevertheless, that his aptitude was nowhere near enough to handle the weapon to its fullest potential.
But the man was unconcerned.
All that mattered was that the selfsame sword of legends he had dreamed of wielding since childhood was now in his possession, to be swung at his whim.

dataList.name: Dawn's First Crow (雞鳴)
dataList.desc: Able to Clash with the enemy's specific Slot

dataList.name: The Sun's Descent (日入)
dataList.desc: Able to Clash with the enemy's specific Slot

dataList.name: Eventide Glow (黃昏)
dataList.desc: Able to Clash with the enemy's specific Slot

dataList.name: Unsevered Memory
dataList.desc:
- Deal +20% damage to and take +20% damage from The Pinky Nursefather; On Clash Win, deal 5 SP damage to The Pinky Nursefather
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; then, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn
- Cannot Retreat

dataList.name: Unseverable Time
dataList.desc:
- Deal +20% damage to and take +20% damage from The Pinky Nursefather; On Clash Win, deal 5 SP damage to The Pinky Nursefather
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; then, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn
- For this Encounter: After using a Skill, gain 1 E.G.O resource of the Skill's Affinity and 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource (2 times per turn)
- Cannot Retreat (including allies)

dataList.name: Tiansha Star's Blade - Arayashiki [天殺星刀阿賴耶識]
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +6
- Offense Level +6
- Inflict 3 more Bleed Potency with Skills
- Turn Start: Gain 3 Offense Level Up for every enemy killed in this Encounter (max 6)
dataList.flavor: 'The heavens themselves are not spared—heaven, earth, man, and the self. This star rises only for the one who perceives all existence and time as a single whole to sever them all.'

dataList.name: Sever the Thread [切絲]
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 3 Bleed and +3 Bleed Count
· Take Slash damage equal to (Stack / 3)
- When hit, take Slash damage equal to (Stack / 5)
- The more this effect stacks...
- Max Stack: 100
dataList.flavor:
'Let everything be severed—you, me, all that has been, and all that will be.'

'Once it is done... I will take Araya back.'

dataList.name: Muga [無我]
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 10 Stack
- The more this effect stacks...
- Max Stack: 100
dataList.flavor: 'So I must hold back on using the blade. And once I'm ready, I will return to that House.'

dataList.name: Desire for Acknowledgement
dataList.desc:
- For every Stack, Deal +5% damage to and take +5% damage from Ryōshū (max 100%)
- Final Power +1 for every 5 Stack when attacking Ryōshū as the main target (max 4)
- At 10+ Stack, lose 5 SP upon Clash Lose
- Max Stack: 20
dataList.flavor: 'Once I'm back home, M-Mister Rien will tell me I did good...'

dataList.name: Way of the Blade
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down for every 5 Stack
· Gain 1 Damage Up and 1 Fragile for every 10 Stack
- Max Stack: 50
dataList.flavor:
It matters not if this dream is but a fleeting one.
Though I may fail to inherit the name of a Star in this life, walking the Way of the Blade shall sharpen and temper this sword of mine.

dataList.name: Shame of the Family
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Slash DMG Up, 1 Clash Power Up, and 1 Fragile
- Cannot gain Mang when using Skills

dataList.name: Shame of the Family
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Slash DMG Up, 2 Clash Power Up, and 2 Fragile
- Cannot gain Mang when using Skills

dataList.name: "K-kill... kill me..."
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 8 Clash Power Down and 5 Power Down

dataList.name: "K-kill... kill me..."
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 10 Clash Power Down and 5 Power Down

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] I
dataList.desc:
Attack and hit a Prescript's Target before the first turn ends.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect when this unit has no Unlock
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 3

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] II
dataList.desc:
Attack and hit a Prescript's Target; or, before this turn passes, hit with 4 or more attacks. Complete before the 4th turn.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect when this unit has Unlock - 1
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 6

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] III
dataList.desc:
Use a powerful Skill that uses 9 different weapon types.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - II
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 9

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] IV
dataList.desc:
Eliminate all obstacles before the next Prescript arrives.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - III

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] - Warning
dataList.desc:
Prioritize eliminating The Prescript's Target.

- Gain this effect starting from the 2nd phase
dataList.flavor:
'The Device's beeping accelerates with every second I let pass without fulfilling a Prescript.'

'And with it, so do the intervals of my heartbeat.'

dataList.name: Unlock - I
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +1, Defense Level +1
- Combat End: Heal 10 SP

dataList.name: Unlock - II
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +2, Defense Level +2
- Combat End: Heal 20 SP

dataList.name: Unlock - III
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +3, Defense Level +3
- Combat End: Heal 30 SP

dataList.name: Karmic Consequence
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 1 Defense Level Down for every 10 Stack
· Gain 1 Fragile for every 20 Stack
· Gain 1 Clash Power Down for every 40 Stack
- Max Stack: 100

dataList.name: Karmic Consequence [Fortuna]
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 1 Defense Level Down for every 10 Stack
· Gain 1 Fragile for every 20 Stack
· Gain 1 Clash Power Down for every 40 Stack
- Max Stack: 200
dataList.flavor: O Fortúna velut luna statu variabilis

dataList.name: Rien's Mask
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level -5, Defense Level -5
- For every Stack, take +5% damage from Skills that inflict Burn or Bleed (includes Potency, Count, and Unique variants)
· If the Skill inflicts both Burn and Bleed, take +7.5% damage for every Stack instead
- Max Stack: 1
dataList.flavor: "I keep it covered because it hurts to even look at."

dataList.name: Sizzling Wound
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level -5, Defense Level -5
- Turn Start: Gain +1 Burn Count and +1 Bleed Count for every Stack
- For every Stack, take +10% damage from Skills that inflict Burn or Bleed (includes Potency, Count, and Unique variants)
· If the Skill inflicts both Burn and Bleed, take +15% damage for every Stack instead
- Max Stack: 5
dataList.flavor: When in proximity of the sword, the wound unheals and the flesh that once cooled burns once again.

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Rien
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Based on the missing HP on this unit...
· Gain 1 Damage Up for every 15% missing HP (max 5)
· Gain 1 Attack Power Up for every 40% missing HP (max 2)
- Gain +1 more Poise Potency and Count from this unit's Skills
- If this unit's SP is higher than the target's, deal +1% damage for every 2 SP difference (max 30%)

dataList.name: Procuration [Hermes]
dataList.desc:
- Gain 1 Stack when using an Attack Skill (once per Skill; does not gain Stack from the same Skill twice)
- Turn Start: at 9 Stack, use a powerful Skill
- Consumed when using a certain Skill
dataList.flavor: "As my god commands."

dataList.name: When hacking through the ribs with a hatchet...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- On Hit without Cracking, gain 2 Poise

dataList.name: When hacking through the ribs with a hatchet...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- On Hit without Cracking, gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count
dataList.flavor: "This is barely a weapon, but it's better than a fork."

dataList.name: When penetrating the lungs with a stiletto...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- On Hit Without Cracking, inflict 2 Sinking

dataList.name: When penetrating the lungs with a stiletto...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 2 Sinking and +2 Sinking Count
dataList.flavor: "I couldn't help but feel a dreadful chill run down my back whenever I'm given this weapon when the situation calls for a horizontal swing. I find it hard to work with this."

dataList.name: When cleaving through the shoulder and the skull with a bastard sword...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: When cleaving through the shoulder and the skull with a bastard sword...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +7.5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, gain 1 Offense Level Up until next turn (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor: "This sword, it's... passable, but that quality in and of itself leaves a lot to be desired. Nevertheless, it can still be a trusty weapon as long as your fundamental skills are solid."

dataList.name: When punching 10 or more holes in the torso with a rapier...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- This Coin deals +5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Defense Level Down next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: When punching 10 or more holes in the torso with a rapier...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- This Coin deals +7.5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Defense Level Down until next turn (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor: "A weapon longer and sharper than the stiletto. I enjoy the rapier as well, as it lends itself quite well to more dexterous techniques."

dataList.name: When caving in the back of the skull with a hammer...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- This Coin deals +5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, raise target's Stagger Threshold by 3

dataList.name: When caving in the back of the skull with a hammer...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- This Coin deals +7.5% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, raise target's Stagger Threshold by 5
dataList.flavor: "Simple, but final. It's not a half-measure like a hatchet—it will crush whatever it hits."

dataList.name: When rending the body with a greatsword...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +10% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Slash Fragility (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: When rending the body with a great sword...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +15% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Slash Fragility until next turn (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor:
"When it comes to wielding blades of ponderous size and weight, such as this one, it is important to find your center of gravity."
"And of course, don't forget to take advantage of its sheer mass."
"I once jumped from the rooftop of a five-story building with this weapon and dropped on top of a Grade 1 Fixer's head, killing him instantly."

dataList.name: When boring a 20-inch hole with a lance...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- This Coin deals +10% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Pierce Fragility (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: When boring a 20-inch hole with a lance...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Pierce damage
- This Coin deals +15% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Pierce Fragility until next turn (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor: "I'd consider this weapon a jackpot. This lance has a self-propelling property as well, which is what allows it to punch through the target—and anything that stands between us as well, whether that is a wall or a person."

dataList.name: When ripping the flesh to ten thousand strips with a whip...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- This Coin deals +10% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Blunt Fragility (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: When ripping the flesh to ten thousand strips with a whip...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Blunt damage
- This Coin deals +15% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, inflict 1 Blunt Fragility until next turn (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor:
"While some may equate this weapon to losing a lottery... I am quite fond of it."
"When this whip cracks, it doesn't just make them bleed; it tears a strip off the target's flesh, and with it their resolve and energy."
"I appreciate that it lets me observe the full process of how someone is deconstructed as they are weakened. Oh, and it can also be used to strangle in a pinch."

dataList.name: When lacerating through space itself with a scythe, like a certain someone...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +20% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, it hits a guaranteed Crit

dataList.name: When lacerating through space itself with a scythe, like a certain someone...
dataList.desc:
- Deals Slash damage
- This Coin deals +30% damage
- On Hit without Cracking, it hits a guaranteed Crit
dataList.flavor:
"The scythe... I could not for the life of me understand how to use this weapon until I saw that Blue Reverberation wield his own."
"Even after I had observed him, the Prescript continued to give me no other weapons than the scythe for a while. Eventually, it became my favorite, most familiar, and sharpest weapon."
"This weapon also cuts the best out of them all. While there are many techniques to cut through space itself— Hm. Perhaps this story is best saved for another time."

dataList.name: Ketsuen [けつえん]
dataList.desc:
Ryōshū's HP cannot drop below 1 as long as there is 1 or more surviving allies in this Encounter
- Clash Power +1; On Hit, deal +10% damage
- On Clash Win, gain 1 E.G.O resource for each of the 3 least-owned Affinities
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; and gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn (no activation cap)
- Cannot Retreat
dataList.flavor: Ryōshū's one and only scabbard, created to control the Tiansha Star's Blade - Arayashiki. This is Araya's E.G.O, forged in the eternal flame.

dataList.name: Renketsuen [れんけつえん]
dataList.desc:
Ryōshū's HP cannot drop below 1 as long as there is 1 or more surviving allies in this Encounter
- Clash Power +2; On Hit, deal +25% damage
- For every Sizzling Wound Stack on target:
· Offense Level +1, Defense Level +1
· Deal +5% damage On Hit (max 25%); if this unit used a Base E.G.O Skill, deal +50% damage per Stack instead (max 250%)
- On Clash Win, gain 1 E.G.O resource for each of the 3 least-owned Affinities
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; and gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn (no activation cap)
- Cannot Retreat
dataList.flavor:
An E.G.O of paradoxical existence, for its ego is faint.
Do not equate what appears to be utter devotion toward someone else with absolute altruism.
One must possess absolute egoism to put the significance of another's life before one's own.

"I don't want mommy to forget about me, but... more than that, I don't wanna lose her."
"So forget me for now, and take care of yourself."

dataList.name: Imitation of a Father
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: Gain 5 Burn, +3 Burn Count, 5 Bleed, and +3 Bleed Count
- Take +20% damage from Sinner Ryōshū

dataList.name: Imitation of a Father
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 5 Burn and 5 Bleed
- Take +10% damage from Sinner Ryōshū

dataList.name: Indulgence in Prescripts
dataList.desc:
- Inflict +2 more Sinking Potency and Count
- Expires at Turn End; then, gain (number of Skills that lost a Clash this turn x 5) Karmic Consequence
dataList.flavor:
The acceptance of the Prescripts is apparent in his execution of them; yet, on the other side of the mask, one may glimpse a hint of resentment for them.
However, as he could indulge in all the suffering and pleasures of the world behind the mask of "Prescripts," his true immanent yearning is concluded by that of gratitude.

dataList.name: Red String
dataList.desc:
- Skill Slot +3
- Deal +50% damage to The Pinky Nursefather
- For this Encounter: After using a Skill, gain 1 E.G.O resource of the Skill's Affinity and 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource (2 times per turn)
- Cannot Retreat
dataList.flavor: 'If this single thread is the only thing that connects you and me, I will cling to it with all my being.'

dataList.name: Red String
dataList.desc:
- Converts all Skill Coins into Unbreakable Coins
- Final Power +4
dataList.flavor: 'Escape as we might, this stubborn thread will force us to cross paths still. It refuses to break, no matter what I do...'

dataList.name: Crit DMG Up
dataList.desc: For this turn: Deal +10% damage on Critical Hit for every Stack

dataList.name: K Corp. Ampule Used
dataList.desc: Used K Corp. Ampule
